faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Download the app from the App Store or Google Play, create an account, and follow the onboarding guide. It's that simple!

faq.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faq.answer: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password' and enter your email address. You'll receive a password reset link via email.

faq.question: How do I sync my data across devices?
faq.answer: Simply sign in with the same account on all your devices. Your data will automatically sync in the background.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. Your privacy and security are our top priorities.

faq.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer: Go to Settings > Subscription > Manage Subscription. You can cancel anytime, and you'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

faq.question: The app is not working. What should I do?
faq.answer: First, try restarting the app. If that doesn't help, make sure you're using the latest version. If the problem persists, contact our support team.

faq.question: Can I use the app offline?
faq.answer: Yes! Most features work offline. Your data will sync automatically when you're back online.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
faq.answer: You can reach us via email at support@example.com, use the contact form on this page, or visit our community forum for help from other users.
